participant_1.background:

i like watching british tv shows and movies.
i am not very tall.

i work as a waitress.

i have entered into many violin competitions before and have placed in a few of them.
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing great! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm glad to hear that you're doing well.
Thanks! I'm excited to talk to you about our shared interests.
Oh, what are our shared interests?
Well, we both like watching British TV shows and movies.
That's right! I love British TV shows and movies. I think they're so well-made.
I agree! They're always so interesting and engaging.
What are some of your favorite British TV shows and movies?
I really love the Sherlock Holmes series, and I also love the movie The King's Speech.
Me too! I love Sherlock Holmes. And The King's Speech was so good.
I'm glad to hear that we have such similar tastes in British TV shows and movies.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
